long_description: Featuring a pump-friendly valve design, our Novara Superlite Presta tube fits 700c x 18 - 23mm tires for fast replacement of your punctured or worn-out tube. Innovative partially threaded valve has a threaded lower half to help keep the valve aligned, secure and rattle-free against your wheel's rim. Smooth upper half of valve enables a bike pump's head to seal securely around the valve without endangering or damaging the pump head's gasket. Please note: this tube works with Presta-compatible rims; partially threaded 48mm Presta valve. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Featuring a pump-friendly valve design, our Novara Superlite Presta tube fits 700c x 18 - 23mm tires for fast replacement of your punctured or worn-out tube.
